statements: SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE title LIKE '%intro%';
SELECT id, title FROM course_materials WHERE id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT * FROM course_materials ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, material_type FROM course_materials;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'video';
SELECT id, title FROM course_materials ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, file_path FROM course_materials WHERE id > 5;
SELECT id, title, material_type, file_path FROM course_materials WHERE file_path LIKE '%.pdf';
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video'
SELECT material_name, material_url FROM course_materials WHERE uploaded_by = 'John Doe'
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM course_materials ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC
SELECT * FROM course_categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL
SELECT category_name, course_id FROM course_categories WHERE course_id = '123456'
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE material_type='video';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM course_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_url FROM course_materials ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, parent_category_id FROM course_categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM course_categories WHERE category_id = '12345' OR course_id = '67890';
SELECT * FROM presentations;
SELECT presentation_id, presentation_name FROM presentations WHERE presentation_id = '1234';
SELECT video_id, video_title FROM videos ORDER BY video_id DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM documents WHERE document_id = '5678';
SELECT * FROM videos LIMIT 5;
SELECT presentation_id, presentation_name FROM presentations
SELECT video_id, video_title FROM videos WHERE video_title LIKE '%tutorial%'
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM documents ORDER BY document_name DESC
SELECT * FROM presentations JOIN videos ON presentations.presentation_id = videos.video_id
SELECT * FROM presentations WHERE presentation_name = 'Conference Presentation'
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT presentation_name, course_name FROM presentations JOIN courses ON presentations.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT video_name, course_name FROM videos JOIN courses ON videos.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE videos.course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT presentations.presentation_id, presentations.presentation_name FROM presentations WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_name LIKE '%tutorial%' ORDER BY video_name ASC;

SELECT documents.document_id, documents.document_name, courses.course_name FROM documents JOIN courses ON documents.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE documents.document_name = 'Introduction.pdf' ORDER BY courses.course_name DESC;

SELECT courses.course_name, COUNT(videos.video_id) AS total_videos FROM courses LEFT JOIN videos ON courses.course_id = videos.course_id GROUP BY courses.course_name HAVING total_videos > 5 ORDER BY total_videos DESC;
SELECT presentations.presentation_name, COUNT(*) AS total_presentations FROM presentations GROUP BY presentations.presentation_name HAVING total_presentations > 10 ORDER BY total_presentations DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT presentation_name FROM presentations WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY presentation_name ASC;
SELECT presentation_name, presentation_id FROM presentations WHERE presentation_id = '12345'
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = '54321'
SELECT document_name, document_id FROM documents ORDER BY document_name ASC
SELECT video_name, video_id FROM videos WHERE video_id IN ('6789', '8765', '4567')
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'video'
